detail_desc: Earrings in textured metal. Length 4 cm.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless dress in velour with a V-neck at the back, seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.

Long-sleeved body in stretch fabric with a stand-up collar, opening front and back, and hook-and-eye fasteners at the back of the neck. Seam at the hips, a microfibre lower section and a lined gusset with press-studs.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Scarf in an airy cotton weave. Size 40x40 cm.
Straight-cut top in sturdy cotton jersey with a boat neck, 3/4-length sleeves and rounded hem.

Short, strapless slip with a padded balconette bra in sturdy microfibre. Slip with a gentle shaping effect on the tummy, bum and thighs. Bra with underwired, moulded cups with extra-thick padding to lift and shape the bust. Silicone trim at the top and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Laser-cut hem with a silicone trim at the front. Shoulder straps included.
Joggers in soft, airy, patterned viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Dungarees in woven fabric made from an organic cotton denim and Tencel™ lyocell blend. Adjustable straps with decorative knot details at the front that cross at the back and fasten with concealed buttons at the back of the waistband. Elastication at the back of the waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Padded outdoor trousers with an elasticated waist, slightly higher cut at the back, zip fly and hook and loop fastening. Reflective detail on the back of one leg, elasticated hems and an elastic strap under the feet. Elastic braces with a hook and loop fastening. Fleece lining.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
5-pocket trousers in imitation leather with a regular waist and slim legs.
Knee-length dress in airy crêpe with a V-shaped opening and pleated section at the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem. Unlined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders.
Short, fitted top in ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline with narrow elastication at the top, and a smocked hem.
Off-the-shoulder top in a plumeti cotton weave with a frill-trimmed top, short, wide sleeves and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a softly draping, patterned viscose weave with a high waist, tie belt and zip fly with a concealed button. Pleats at the front, side pockets and straight, wide legs.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an opening and woven ties at the back of the neck, gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Set with a dress and tights. Fine-knit dress in a cotton blend containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and buttons at the back. Fine-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
Metal chain necklaces. Length approx. 55 cm.
Hipster briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fine-knit knee socks in a soft cotton blend with a high shaft that ends at the knee.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in a patterned weave with a stand-up collar, detachable hood and zip down the front. Elastication around the hood, cuffs and hem. Partly lined in fleece.
Aviator-style sunglasses with decorations at the top. Metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

T-shirt in cotton jersey and joggers in sweatshirt fabric. T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a back pocket and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short cycling shorts in organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and overlocked hems.
Windbreaker in a nylon weave with a lined, drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Side pockets, an inner pocket and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Gently rounded hem and slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Short dress in a viscose weave with a visible seam centre back, long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh sections. Lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and wide, adjustable shoulder straps with bonded seams that continue into wide elastic straps at the back. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back and a bonded hem. Extra firm support.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved Henley top in organic slub cotton jersey with a button placket and a woven yoke.
Wide V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with short sleeves and buttons down the front.
Dress in glittery tulle with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves in double-layered tulle and a gathered seam at the hem with a flared flounce. Lined.

Shirt jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem. Unlined.
Cardigan in soft, fluffy faux fur with long sleeves and a concealed button at the front. Jersey lining.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Coat in a felted wool blend with notch lapels, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with wide, sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist, large patch front pockets, high slits in the sides and a box pleat at the back. Unlined.
Thin metal necklace with a pendant in the shape of a ring with sparkly stones. Adjustable length 41-47 cm.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Block-striped jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Straight-cut shirt in soft flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, and a rounded hem.
Thigh boots in soft imitation suede with a drawstring at the top and pointed toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.

Rain trousers in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and adjustable elastic braces with plastic fasteners. Press-studs at the sides, elastication at the back of the waist and hems, a reinforced elastic strap under the feet and reflective details. Unlined. The trousers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless playsuit in soft jersey with narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and short legs.
Wide, ankle-length trousers with print stripes, a concealed zip in the side and straight legs.
Long-sleeved top in jersey with a print motif. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with creases, a regular waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Wide, trousers in pleated, heavily draping satin with a high waist and a concealed zip at the back.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped chest pocket and side pocket, small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a tab and press-stud at the sides. Lined.
Trousers in a striped weave made from a linen blend containing some Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated waist, discreet side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Kangol x H&M. Small bag decoration with a zip. Metal carabiner hook to attach it to your bag. Size approx. 9x7 cm.
Track pants in fast-drying functional fabric made from recycled polyester with covered elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, pockets in the side seams and cuffed hems.
Tunic in an airy viscose weave with a collar, concealed button placket and side pockets. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Boat-neck jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
V-neck top in an airy weave with pleats on the shoulders, short, raglan flutter sleeves, and a rounded hem. Loose fit.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Wide elasticated, ribbed waist, patch front pockets, a back pocket and straight legs.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a slightly wider neckline with an overlocked edge. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
5-pocket, skinny-fit, low rise jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a zip fly and super-skinny legs.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit with a motif on the front, ribbing around the neckline, slits in the sides and long sleeves with roll edges.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist and wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique. Concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Double-layered tube scarf in jersey.

Knee-length tunic in crisp cotton poplin with a high, smocked stand-up collar, lace embroidery at the top and covered buttons at the back. V-shaped yoke with broderie anglaise at the front and an opening at the back. Long, wide raglan sleeves with inset trims and wide, smocked cuffs with embroidered lace trims. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Shaping. 5-pocket jeans in washed denim with technical stretch that holds in and shapes the tummy, thighs and seat while keeping the jeans in shape. Regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps and press-studs at the crotch.
Sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit.

Long kaftan dress woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend containing some linen. Double stand-up collar with a V-shaped opening and drawstrings at the front and long, wide raglan sleeves with covered elastication at the cuffs. Asymmetric seam at the waist with covered elastication at the back and drawstrings at the front. Longer at the back. Lined in a cotton weave.
